    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply(Particle p)
        Transitions a particle vertically within the water column according to a text-based transition matrix. This method also uniformly distributes particles within strata, and performs a check using bathymetry information to ensure that particles do not intercept the seafloor.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface VerticalMigration
        Parameters:
        p - - The particle to be acted upon
